concept.title: Release Notes
concept.shortdesc: Release notes for the 3.1 version of the Kafka Connector.

ul.li: KAFKAC-71: Support for RBAC credentials on Couchbase Server 5+.
KAFKAC-66: On backfilling from large bucket, it is possible to get OOM when internal queue is not drained quickly enough to relay the data into Kafka.

section.title: Couchbase Kafka Connector 3.1.1 GA (21 February 2017)
section.p: Version 3.1.1 is maintenance release. It contains fixes for resuming DCP streams after restart.

ul.li: KAFKAC-56: Session state might be left partially initialized, which leads to rolling back to sequence number zero (0) and starting from the beginning (duplicating events in Kafka topic).

section.title: Couchbase Kafka Connector 3.0.0 GA (14 December 2016)
section.p: Version 3.0.0 is GA release. It brings documentation update.

section.title: Couchbase Kafka Connector 3.0.0 BETA (22 November 2016)
section.p: Version 3.0.0-BETA is pre-release version of the 3.0.0. It brings documentation update, feature enhancements and bug fixes

ul.li: Update dependencies: dcp-client to 0.7.0, and confluent libraries up to versions shipped with 3.1.1
Cleanup various configuration workarounds for platform 3.0

section.title: Couchbase Kafka Connector 3.0.0 DP4 (5 November 2016)
section.p: Version 3.0.0-DP4 is the fourth developer preview of the 3.0.x series.

ul.li: KAFKAC-54: Create example of using in Kafka Stream to process events from Couchbase
Rename internal classes, and make configuration more consistent with other connectors (e.g. instead of timeout_ms, use timeout.ms)
Allow to override internal convertor into SourceRecord, and allow to inject Filter class to skip events before writing into Kafka

section.title: Couchbase Kafka Connector 3.0.0 DP3 (20 October 2016)
section.p: Version 3.0.0-DP3 is the third developer preview of the 3.0.x series. It implements new features and also includes bug fixes to previous release.

ul.li: KAFKAC-50: Allow to buffer DCP snapshots for consistent writes.
KAFKAC-51: Specify key for SourceRecord. Allows to use multiple Kafka partitions.
KAFKAC-53: Node-aware distribution of partitions for Tasks. Reduces amount of resources allocated on the server.

section.title: Couchbase Kafka Connector 3.0.0 DP2 (24 September 2016)
section.p: Version 3.0.0-DP2 is the second developer preview of the 3.0.x series. It improves configuration. And now can maintain replication state, which allow to resume transmission.

section.title: Couchbase Kafka Connector 3.0.0 DP1 (6 September 2016)
section.p: Version 3.0.0-DP1 is the first developer preview of the 3.0.x series.
